property.value: SELECT ID, Company_ID, Dept_ID, BusiOrg_ID, Code, Name, Type, Move_Type, Send_Type, Origin, Purchase_ID, Sale_ID, Project_ID, Partner_ID, Warehose_ID, Pred_Date, Recpt_IN_Date, QC_Date, QC_Anomaly_Sate, QC_Note, Recpt_Out_Date, Deal_End_Date, State, Invoice_State, Auto_Picking, Back_Order_ID, Account_Date, Stock_Journal_ID, Move_IN_User, Move_Out_User, Move_Destined, Note, Flow_State, CreateUser, CreateDate, WriteDate, WriteUser FROM stock_picking

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT A.production_line_Code,A.id AS mrp_production_routing_hour_id,B.* FROM mrp_production_routing_hour AS A RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM mrp_task_routing LEFT JOIN (SELECT task_id , max(routing_num) AS routing_num, max(CASE code WHEN '001' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS waixie , max(CASE code WHEN '002' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS beiliao , max(CASE code WHEN '003' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS jiguang , max(CASE code WHEN '004' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS shuchong, max(CASE code WHEN '005' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS zhewan , max(CASE code WHEN '006' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS yamao , max(CASE code WHEN '007' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS yahan , max(CASE code WHEN '008' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS qiege , max(CASE code WHEN '009' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS dakong , max(CASE code WHEN '010' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS gongsi , max(CASE code WHEN '011' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS hanjie , max(CASE code WHEN '012' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS damo , max(CASE code WHEN '013' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS lasi , max(CASE code WHEN '014' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS siyin , max(CASE code WHEN '015' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS peitu , max(CASE code WHEN '016' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS zuzhuang FROM mrp_routing_hour GROUP BY task_id ) AS mrp_routing_hour ON task_id =mrp_task_routing.id ) AS B ON A.production_line_no = B.ID

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * FROM mrp_task_routing LEFT JOIN (SELECT task_id , max(routing_num) AS routing_num, max(CASE code WHEN '001' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS waixie , max(CASE code WHEN '002' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS beiliao , max(CASE code WHEN '003' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS jiguang , max(CASE code WHEN '004' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS shuchong, max(CASE code WHEN '005' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS zhewan , max(CASE code WHEN '006' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS yamao , max(CASE code WHEN '007' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS yahan , max(CASE code WHEN '008' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS qiege , max(CASE code WHEN '009' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS dakong , max(CASE code WHEN '010' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS gongsi , max(CASE code WHEN '011' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS hanjie , max(CASE code WHEN '012' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS damo , max(CASE code WHEN '013' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS lasi , max(CASE code WHEN '014' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS siyin , max(CASE code WHEN '015' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS peitu , max(CASE code WHEN '016' THEN hour_planned ELSE '' END) AS zuzhuang FROM mrp_routing_hour GROUP BY task_id ) AS mrp_routing_hour ON task_id =mrp_task_routing.id

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, type, code, name, hour_planned, routing_num, task_id, task_code, up_routing_id, up_routing_code, Note, WriteUser, WriteDate, CreateUser, CreateDate FROM mrp_routing_hour

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, Company_ID, Dept_ID, BusiOrg_ID, Code, Name, Type, Move_Type, Send_Type, Origin, Purchase_ID, Sale_ID, Project_ID, Partner_ID, Warehose_ID, Pred_Date, Recpt_IN_Date, QC_Date, QC_Anomaly_Sate, QC_Note, Recpt_Out_Date, Deal_End_Date, State, Invoice_State, Auto_Picking, Back_Order_ID, Account_Date, Stock_Journal_ID, Move_IN_User, Move_Out_User, Move_Destined, Note, Flow_State, CreateUser, CreateDate, WriteDate, WriteUser FROM stock_picking

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID, Company_ID, Dept_ID, BusiOrg_ID, Type, Categ_ID, Code, Name, Short_Name, Help_Tag, Bar_Code, Specs, Brand, Warranty, Uom_ID, Uom_Precision, Each_Weight, Weight_Unit_ID, Each_Volume, Volume_Unit_ID, Supply_Method, Purchase_Ok, Sale_Ok, Sale_Delay, Desc_Purchase, Produce_Delay, Product_Manager, Procure_Method, Cost_Method, Desc_Feature, Desc_Sale, Loc_Rack, Loc_Row, State, Note, CreateCompany_ID, CreateDate, CreateUser, WriteDate, WriteUser FROM product_product

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT Product_Actual_Qty, Product_Occupy_Qty,(Product_Actual_Qty-Product_Occupy_Qty) AS Product_Enable_Qty,product_product.ID,product_product.COMPANY_ID,product_product.DEPT_ID,product_product.BUSIORG_ID,product_product.TYPE,product_product.CATEG_ID,product_product.CODE,product_product.NAME,product_product.SHORT_NAME,product_product.HELP_TAG,product_product.BAR_CODE,product_product.SPECS,product_product.BRAND,product_product.WARRANTY,product_product.UOM_ID,product_product.UOM_PRECISION,product_product.EACH_WEIGHT,product_product.WEIGHT_UNIT_ID,product_product.EACH_VOLUME,product_product.VOLUME_UNIT_ID,product_product.SUPPLY_METHOD,product_product.PURCHASE_OK,product_product.SALE_OK,product_product.SALE_DELAY,product_product.DESC_PURCHASE,product_product.PRODUCE_DELAY,product_product.PRODUCT_MANAGER,product_product.PROCURE_METHOD,product_product.COST_METHOD,product_product.DESC_SALE,product_product.LOC_RACK,product_product.LOC_ROW,product_product.STATE,product_product.NOTE,product_product.CREATECOMPANY_ID,product_product.CREATEDATE,product_product.CREATEUSER,product_product.WRITEDATE,product_product.WRITEUSER FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN Actual IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Actual END AS Product_Actual_Qty, CASE WHEN Occupy IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Occupy END AS Product_Occupy_Qty , product_product.ID,product_product.COMPANY_ID,product_product.DEPT_ID,product_product.BUSIORG_ID,product_product.TYPE,product_product.CATEG_ID,product_product.CODE,product_product.NAME,product_product.SHORT_NAME,product_product.HELP_TAG,product_product.BAR_CODE,product_product.SPECS,product_product.BRAND,product_product.WARRANTY,product_product.UOM_ID,product_product.UOM_PRECISION,product_product.EACH_WEIGHT,product_product.WEIGHT_UNIT_ID,product_product.EACH_VOLUME,product_product.VOLUME_UNIT_ID,product_product.SUPPLY_METHOD,product_product.PURCHASE_OK,product_product.SALE_OK,product_product.SALE_DELAY,product_product.DESC_PURCHASE,product_product.PRODUCE_DELAY,product_product.PRODUCT_MANAGER,product_product.PROCURE_METHOD,product_product.COST_METHOD,product_product.DESC_SALE,product_product.LOC_RACK,product_product.LOC_ROW,product_product.STATE,product_product.NOTE,product_product.CREATECOMPANY_ID,product_product.CREATEDATE,product_product.CREATEUSER,product_product.WRITEDATE,product_product.WRITEUSER FROM product_product LEFT JOIN (SELECT Code, sum((CASE WHEN (Type = '0') THEN Product_Qty ELSE (0 - Product_Qty ) END)) AS Actual FROM stock_move WHERE stock_move.State ='20' GROUP BY CODE) AS mva ON mva.code=product_product.code LEFT JOIN (SELECT Code, sum((CASE WHEN (Type = '1') THEN Product_Qty ELSE 0 END )) AS Occupy FROM stock_move WHERE stock_move.State ='10' GROUP BY CODE) AS mvb ON mvb.code=product_product.code ) AS product_product

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT Stock_Move.ID,Stock_Move.Company_ID,Stock_Move.Dept_ID,Stock_Move.BusiOrg_ID,Stock_Move.Picking_ID,Stock_Move.Origin,Stock_Move.Purchase_ID, Stock_Move.Purchase_Line_ID,Stock_Move.Sale_ID,Stock_Move.Sale_Line_ID,Stock_Move.Type,Stock_Move.Product_ID,Stock_Move.Code,Stock_Move.Name,product_product.Specs, Stock_Move.Ware_Hose_ID,Stock_Move.Location_ID, Stock_Move.Product_Uom, Stock_Move.Price_Currency, Stock_Move.Source_Price_Unit, Stock_Move.Price_Unit, Stock_Move.Tar_Product_Qty, Stock_Move.Product_Qty, Stock_Move.Pred_Date, Stock_Move.Real_Date, Stock_Move.Move_End_Date, Stock_Move.QC_Type, Stock_Move.QC_Flag, Stock_Move.State, Stock_Move.Inventory_State, Stock_Move.Valuation_State, Stock_Move.Busi_Batch, Stock_Move.Auto_Picking, Stock_Move.Note, Stock_Move.CreateUser, Stock_Move.CreateDate, Stock_Move.WriteDate, Stock_Move.WriteUser,Stock_Move.Brand ,Stock_Move.QC_Type,Stock_Move.QC_Flag,Stock_Move.product_actual_qty,Stock_Move.product_occupy_qty,Stock_Move.product_enable_qty FROM Stock_Move LEFT JOIN product_product ON Stock_Move.Code=product_product.Code

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID,Code,Name,Specs,'' AS WareHose_ID,Uom_ID,Product_Actual_Qty, Product_Occupy_Qty, Product_Enable_Qty FROM view_stock_qty

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO Stock_Picking(ID,Company_ID,Dept_ID,BusiOrg_ID,Code,Name,Type,Move_Type,Send_Type,Origin,Purchase_ID,Sale_ID,Project_ID,Partner_ID,Warehose_ID,Pred_Date,Recpt_IN_Date,QC_Date,Recpt_Out_Date,Deal_End_Date,State,Invoice_State,Auto_Picking,Back_Order_ID,Account_Date,Stock_Journal_ID,Move_IN_User,Move_Out_User,Move_Destined,Note,CreateUser,CreateDate,WriteDate,WriteUser,Flow_State) VALUES({#uuid},{company},{dept},{busiorg},{#stock.picking.ly.ck.code},{name},{type},{movetype},{sendtype},{origin},{purchase},{sale},{project},{partner},{warehose},{preddate},{recptindate},{qcdate},{recptoutdate},{dealenddate},{state},{invoicestate},{autopicking},{backorder},{accountdate},{stockjournal},{moveinuser},{moveoutuser},{movedestined},{note},{createuser},{createdate},{writedate},{writeuser},{flow_state})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO mrp_production_line (ID, Company_ID, Dept_ID, BusiOrg_ID, Code, Name, Type, Production_ID, Production_Code, no, Origin, Partner_ID, Product_ID, Product_Code, Product_Name, Product_Qty, Product_Uom, date_planned, date_start, date_finished, State, Flow_State, Note, CreateUser, CreateDate, WriteDate, WriteUser, Routing_ID, Routing_Code, hour_planned, routing_progress, deal_hour) VALUES ({#uuid}, {company_id}, {dept_id}, {busiorg_id}, {#stock.production.line.code}, {name}, {type}, {production_id}, {production_code}, {no}, {origin}, {partner_id}, {product_id}, {product_code}, {product_name}, {product_qty}, {product_uom}, {date_planned}, {date_start}, {date_finished}, {state}, {flow_state}, {note}, {createuser}, {createdate}, {writedate}, {writeuser}, {routing_id}, {routing_code}, {hour_planned}, {routing_progress}, {deal_hour})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO mrp_production (ID, Company_ID, Dept_ID, BusiOrg_ID, Code, Name, Type, Origin, Sale_ID, Project_ID, Partner_ID, Product_ID, Product_Code, Product_Name, Product_Qty, Product_Uom, Bom_ID, Bom_Code, production_draw_id, production_draw_code, date_planned, date_start, date_finished, cycle_total, cycle_uom, hour_total, user_id, workcenter_id, State, Flow_State, Note, CreateUser, CreateDate, WriteDate, WriteUser) VALUES ({#uuid}, {company_id}, {dept_id}, {busiorg_id}, {#stock.production.ly.sc.code}, {name}, {type}, {origin}, {sale_id}, {project_id}, {partner_id}, {product_id}, {product_code}, {product_name}, {product_qty}, {product_uom}, {bom_id}, {bom_code}, {production_draw_id}, {production_draw_code}, {date_planned}, {date_start}, {date_finished}, {cycle_total}, {cycle_uom}, {hour_total}, {user_id}, {workcenter_id}, {state}, {flow_state}, {note}, {createuser}, {createdate}, {writedate}, {writeuser})

property.value: INSERT INTO Stock_Picking(ID,Company_ID,Dept_ID,BusiOrg_ID,Code,Name,Type,Move_Type,Send_Type,Origin,Purchase_ID,Sale_ID,Project_ID,Warehose_ID,Pred_Date,Recpt_IN_Date,QC_Date,Recpt_Out_Date,Deal_End_Date,State,Invoice_State,Auto_Picking,Back_Order_ID,Account_Date,Stock_Journal_ID,Move_IN_User,Move_Out_User,Move_Destined,Note,CreateUser,CreateDate,WriteDate,WriteUser) VALUES({#uuid},{company},{dept},{busiorg},{#stock.picking.code},{name},{type},{movetype},{sendtype},{origin},{purchase},{sale},{project},{warehose},{preddate},{recptindate},{qcdate},{recptoutdate},{dealenddate},{state},{invoicestate},{autopicking},{backorder},{accountdate},{stockjournal},{moveinuser},{moveoutuser},{movedestined},{note},{createuser},{createdate},{writedate},{writeuser})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO Stock_Picking(ID,Company_ID,Dept_ID,BusiOrg_ID,Code,Name,Type,Move_Type,Send_Type,Origin,Purchase_ID,Sale_ID,Project_ID,Warehose_ID,Pred_Date,Recpt_IN_Date,QC_Date,Recpt_Out_Date,Deal_End_Date,State,Invoice_State,Auto_Picking,Back_Order_ID,Account_Date,Stock_Journal_ID,Move_IN_User,Move_Out_User,Move_Destined,Note,CreateUser,CreateDate,WriteDate,WriteUser,Flow_State) VALUES({#uuid},{company},{dept},{busiorg},{#stock.picking.code},{name},{type},{movetype},{sendtype},{origin},{purchase},{sale},{project},{warehose},{preddate},{recptindate},{qcdate},{recptoutdate},{dealenddate},{state},{invoicestate},{autopicking},{backorder},{accountdate},{stockjournal},{moveinuser},{moveoutuser},{movedestined},{note},{createuser},{createdate},{writedate},{writeuser},{flow_state})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO Stock_Picking(ID,Company_ID,Dept_ID,BusiOrg_ID,Code,Name,Type,Move_Type,Send_Type,Origin,Purchase_ID,Sale_ID,Project_ID,Warehose_ID,Pred_Date,Recpt_IN_Date,QC_Date,Recpt_Out_Date,Deal_End_Date,State,Invoice_State,Auto_Picking,Back_Order_ID,Account_Date,Stock_Journal_ID,Move_IN_User,Move_Out_User,Move_Destined,Note,CreateUser,CreateDate,WriteDate,WriteUser,Flow_State) VALUES({#uuid},{company},{dept},{busiorg},{#stock.picking.code},{name},{type},{movetype},{sendtype},{origin},{purchase},{sale},{project},{warehose},{preddate},{recptindate},{qcdate},{recptoutdate},{dealenddate},{state},{invoicestate},{autopicking},{backorder},{accountdate},{stockjournal},{moveinuser},{moveoutuser},{movedestined},{note},{createuser},{createdate},{writedate},{writeuser},{flow_state})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO STOCK_MOVE(ID,COMPANY_ID,DEPT_ID,BUSIORG_ID,PICKING_ID,ORIGIN,PURCHASE_ID,PURCHASE_LINE_ID,SALE_ID,SALE_LINE_ID,TYPE,PRODUCT_ID,CODE,NAME,PARTNER_ID,WARE_HOSE_ID,LOCATION_ID,PRODUCT_UOM,PRICE_CURRENCY,SOURCE_PRICE_UNIT,PRICE_UNIT,TAR_PRODUCT_QTY,PRODUCT_QTY,PRED_DATE,REAL_DATE,MOVE_END_DATE,QC_TYPE,QC_FLAG,STATE,INVENTORY_STATE,VALUATION_STATE,BUSI_BATCH,AUTO_PICKING,NOTE,CREATEUSER,CREATEDATE,WRITEDATE,WRITEUSER,product_actual_qty,product_occupy_qty,product_enable_qty,Brand) VALUES({#stock.picking_move.id},{company_id},{dept_id},{busiorg_id},{picking_id},{origin},{purchase_id},{purchase_line_id},{sale_id},{sale_line_id},{type},{product_id},{code},{name},{partner_id},{ware_hose_id},{location_id},{product_uom},{price_currency},{source_price_unit},{price_unit},{tar_product_qty},{product_qty},{pred_date},{real_date},{move_end_date},{qc_type},{qc_flag},{state},{inventory_state},{valuation_state},{busi_batch},{auto_picking},{note},{createuser},{createdate},{writedate},{writeuser},{product_actual_qty},{product_occupy_qty},{product_enable_qty},{brand})

property.name: sql
property.value: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_PRODUCT(ID,Company_ID,Dept_ID,BusiOrg_ID,Type,Categ_ID,Code,Name,Short_Name,Help_Tag,Bar_Code,Specs,Brand,Warranty,Uom_ID,Uom_Precision,Each_Weight,Weight_Unit_ID,Each_Volume,Volume_Unit_ID,Supply_Method,Purchase_Ok,Sale_Ok,Sale_Delay,Desc_Purchase,Produce_Delay,Product_Manager,Procure_Method,Cost_Method,Desc_Feature,Desc_Sale,Loc_Rack,Loc_Row,State,Note,CreateCompany_ID,CreateDate,CreateUser,WriteDate,WriteUser) VALUES({id},{#session.USER_INFO.oid},{dept_id},{busiorg_id},{type},{categ_id},{code},{name},{short_name},{help_tag},{bar_code},{specs},{brand},{warranty},{uom_id},{uom_precision},{each_weight:double},{weight_unit_id},{each_volume:double},{volume_unit_id},{supply_method},{purchase_ok},{sale_ok},{sale_delay:int},{desc_purchase},{produce_delay:int},{product_manager},{procure_method},{cost_method},{desc},{desc_sale},{loc_rack},{loc_row},{state},{note},{#session.USER_INFO.oid},{#current_date},{#session.USER_INFO.uid},{writedate},{writeuser})

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE PRODUCT_PRODUCT SET NAME={name},BRAND={brand},SPECS={specs},UOM_ID={uom_id},UOM_PRECISION={uom_precision},TYPE={type},NOTE={note} WHERE CODE={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE Stock_Picking SET State={state},Flow_State={flow_state} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_production SET State = {state} WHERE ID = {id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_production_routing_hour SET production_line_no = {production_line_no},WriteUser = {writeuser},WriteDate = {writedate} WHERE ID={mrp_production_routing_hour_id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_production_line SET Name = {name},Type = {type},date_planned = {date_planned},date_start = {date_start} WHERE Code={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_production_line SET state = {state} WHERE Code={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_task_routing SET code = {code},name = {name},WriteUser = {writeuser},WriteDate = {writedate} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_routing_hour SET code = {code},name = {name},hour_planned = {hour_planned},routing_num = {routing_num}, WriteUser = {writeuser},WriteDate = {writedate} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
sql
property.value: UPDATE STOCK_PICKING SET ORIGIN={origin},PARTNER_ID={partner},PRED_DATE={preddate},WAREHOSE_ID={warehose},MOVE_IN_USER={moveinuser},NOTE={note},WriteUser={writeusercode} ,WriteDate={writedate} WHERE CODE={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE mrp_production SET Name = {name}, Type = {type}, Origin = {origin}, Partner_ID = {partner_id}, Product_Code = {product_code}, Product_Name = {product_name}, Product_Qty = {product_qty}, Product_Uom = {product_uom}, Bom_Code = {bom_code}, production_draw_code = {production_draw_code}, date_planned = {date_planned}, date_start = {date_start}, user_id = {user_id}, Note = {note}, WriteDate = {writedate}, WriteUser = {writeuser} WHERE CODE={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE STOCK_PICKING SET WriteUser={writeusercode},WriteDate={writedate},QC_Anomaly_Sate={qc_anomaly_sate} ,QC_Date={qc_date},QC_Note={qc_note} WHERE CODE={code}

property.name: sql
sql
property.value: UPDATE Stock_move SET State={state} WHERE Picking_ID={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: UPDATE Stock_Picking SET State={state} WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_PRODUCT WHERE CODE={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM stock_move WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_production WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_production_line WHERE ID={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_production_routing_hour WHERE production_line_no ={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_task_routing WHERE ID ={id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_routing_hour WHERE task_id ={task_id}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM mrp_production_line WHERE Production_Code={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM stock_move WHERE Picking_id={code}

property.name: sql
property.value: DELETE FROM stock_picking WHERE code={code}
